name: Backgammon (Dynacomp)
overview: Backgammon is a video game adaptation of the millenniums-old board game of the same name. It was developed for the Atari 800 and released by Dynacomp Incorporated in 1981. Written in BASIC, it allows for one or two player play. The board is graphically displayed, and the player uses number inputs to place moves. Only legal moves are allowed.
